name: Stachees
description:
Play the most addictive endless puzzle game on mobile!

Join the Stachees in the game you won't wan to put down. It is up to you to fill in all of the missing Stachees as they scroll by at an ever increasing pace in this addictive endless fill game!

** “#1 Stachee game in the world!” **
** "This game is wicked awesome!" **
** "The action doesn't end." **
** "Very Addictive." **

STACHEES

Key features:
• Endless action
• Vivid cartoon look and feel
• Adorable Stachees that you’ll love!
• Easy to play, hard to play awesome
• Constant free updates with new game play innovations

ALREADY A FAN? Like the Stachees on Facebook or follow them on Twitter for all the latest Stachee gossip.
* Facebook: http://facebook.com/orangethinkbox
* Twitter: http://twitter.com/orangethinkbox
